Subtitle: AMBRA LIMONCELLO SPRITZ _
Description: The Limoncello Spritz is a vibrant, citrusy twist on the classic spritz. Refreshing, light, and perfect for sunny days. With lower ABV and strong visual appeal, it taps into key trends like sessionable drinking and citrus-forward flavours. Ideal for brunches, terraces, and summer menus.__
Method: Add ingredients to glass_;Fill with ice_;Stir gently to mix_;Garnish__

Subtitle: ACT OF TREASON
Description: As one of the world's best-selling cocktails, the margarita is a proven volume driver and a must-have on any beverage list looking to tap into classic cocktail trends and deliver strong returns.
Method: Add all ingredients to  cocktail shaker_;Fill with ice & shake_;Strain, or dump into a salt rimmed glass

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE _
Description: The Southside is a modern classic. With its crisp, refreshing finish and broad appeal, it caters perfectly to today' s consumer demand for clean, herbaceous, and lower-sugar cocktails. Ideal for summer menus and outdoor occasions. The Southside offers a premium yet approachable option that elevates any cocktail list and encourages repeat orders.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker_;Fill with ice & shake_;Double strain into chilled Coupe glass_

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE WHISKY _
Description: Offering a point of difference on any menu, this cocktail appeals to both whisky aficionados and adventurous drinkers - ideal for premium venues looking to elevate their cocktail list with something bold, memorable, and conversation-worthy.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with an orange twist

Subtitle: GREY GOOSE
Description: As a globally recognized icon, the martini brings instant credibility and premium cues to any cocktail list, making it a must-have for venues aiming to elevate their offering with a timeless, high-margin serve.
Method: Put all ingredients into chilled mixing glass; Fill with ice & stir until cold; Strain into frozen Martini glass; Garnish with lemon twist or olives

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE
Description: A vibrant blend of tangy cranberry, zesty lime, and the smooth warmth of vodka, rounded by a hint of orange liqueur. Each sip is bright and playful, with a refreshing, slightly tart finish that feels effortlessly chic.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into chilled coupe glass; Garnish with flamed orange zest

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE
Description: The Aviation offers a unique blend of botanical gin, maraschino liqueur, lemon, and a hint of creme de Violette. Its floral notes, balanced acidity, and striking colour make it a standout serve. Perfect for venues looking to elevate their menu with a refined, premium cocktail that sparks interest and drives discovery.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice and shake; Double strain into chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with lemon zest or maraschino cherry

Subtitle: UNICO
Description: Bright, zesty, and effortlessly refreshing, the Mando Spritz combines sweet mandarin, crisp bubbles, and a touch of herbal bitterness. It' s a vibrant, lower-ABV serve that taps into spritz and citrus trends. Perfect for daytime occasions, outdoor menus, and consumers seeking lighter, uplifting options.
Method: Add all ingredients to glass; Fill with ice & stir; Garnish

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE
Description: A proven crowd-pleaser, the Espresso Martini blends rich espresso, smooth vodka, and coffee liqueur for a bold, velvety serve. Its indulgent flavour and energizing finish make it a high-demand cocktail. Perfect for late-night menus, dessert pairings, and guests seeking both sophistication and a pick-me-up.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Fill with ice & shake; Double strain into a chilled Coupe glass; Garnish

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE
Description: Smooth and citrus-forward blend of gin, fresh lemon juice, and a touch of orange liqueur. Its crisp, bright flavours are balanced by a silky texture, offering a refreshing and sophisticated sip with a clean, tart finish. This timeless cocktail brings balance, sophistication, and broad appeal. Ideal for venues looking to elevate their gin offering with a clean, elegant serve.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Shake without ice; Add ice and shake again; Double strain into a chilled Coupe glass; Garnish with a lemon twist

Subtitle: BUFFALO TRACE
Description: A Baby G is a layered shot cocktail that mimics the appearance of a miniature pint of Guinness by using coffee liqueur as the base and Irish cream liqueur to create a creamy, layered effect. Listing a Baby G adds a visually striking, fun shot option that boosts impulse orders, encourages group participation, and leverages the popularity of coffee and cream liqueurs for increased sales.
Method: Fill a shot glass 2/3 full with Unico Caffe; Pour the Irish cream over the back of a spoon. It will layer on top of the Unico Caffe and form the head that makes this cocktail look like Guinness

Subtitle: ACT OF TREASON
Description: Listing an Agave Slammer taps into the rising popularity of agave spirits and offers a fun, shareable experience that drives group sales, social engagement and menu differentiation.
Method: Pour the ingredients into a shot glass; Cover the glass with a napkin and your hand; Slam the glass on the bar counter; Drink while it' s still fizzing

Subtitle: PATRON
Description: These shots taste just like a classic margarita, so they are not too sweet and not too strong, so everyone is guaranteed to love the taste. A mini Marg is perfect for group orders, broad appeal and boosting quick-turn beverage sales.
Method: Run a wedge of lime around the rim of each shooter glass; Roll the edge of the shooter into the salt; Add the tequila, Cointreau and lime juice to a cocktail shaker filled with ice. Shake well; Strain into the prepared shooter glasses, add any optional garnish and serve

Subtitle: BUFFALO TRACE
Description: Listing a Jam Donut Shot adds a fun, nostalgic option to the menu that appeals to sweet-tooth drinkers, encourages social sharing, and drives incremental sales through novelty and group appeal.
Method: Add the strawberry liqueur to a shot glass; Place a small spoon gently inside the shot glass over the strawberry and slowly pour the Bailey's until it reaches near the top

Subtitle: MONKEY SHOULDER/AQUAFAB:
Description: By offering a timeless favorite like the Whiskey Sour, the venue can attract both whiskey enthusiasts and casual drinkers, boosting beverage turnover and enhancing the overall guest experience - ultimately increasing revenue and repeat business.
Method: Add all ingredients to a cocktail shaker; Shake without ice; Add ice and shake again; Double strain into a chilled coupe glass; Garnish with a lemon twist

Subtitle: Buffalo Trace
Description: A timeless whiskey classic, the Old Fashioned delivers bold, simple flavour with broad appeal. With the resurgence of classic cocktails, it' s a high-margin essential for any premium drinks menu.
Method: Add ingredients to mixing glass; 3/4 fill with ice; Stir for 5-7 seconds or until cold and well mixed

Subtitle: WET PUSSY
Description: A seamlessly crafted fusion of select ingredients, including the finest alcohol, succulent peach, tangy cranberry, and zesty lime, all harmonizing into a symphony of taste. Buying this prebatched shot allows for speed of service and simplicity of ingredients.

Subtitle: SOUR PUSS LIQUEUR
Description: Sour Puss Apple is fast to serve and highly profitable, perfect for busy venues. Its ready-to-pour format makes it ideal for quick shots or simple mixed drinks, keeping service speed high during peak hours. With its low cost per bottle and strong customer appeal, it delivers excellent margins on every serve.

Subtitle: FIREBALL
Description: Fireball is a quick-pour, high-turnover product that thrives in busy bar settings. Its ready-to-serve cinnamon whisky liqueur is perfect for rapid-fire shots or simple mixers, keeping service times minimal. Its strong brand recognition allows the delivery of high margins and repeat orders, making it a profitable staple for any venue.

Subtitle: ARCHIE ROSE TRUE CUT VODKA
Description: The Red Bull Vodka is a high-demand, recognizable drink that appeals to a wide audience, making it a reliable menu staple. Its ease of preparation and premium pricing deliver strong profit margins, with customers often ordering multiple rounds, boosting overall sales.

Subtitle: SHEEPDOG
Description: Sheep Dog Peanut Butter Whiskey is a fast-pour, easy-serve spirit ideal for high-volume service. Its smooth, sweet peanut butter flavour makes it a popular choice for quick shots or simple mixed drinks, reducing prep time. With its unique flavour profile and premium positioning, it commands strong margins and repeat orders, making it a profitable addition to any bar menu.

Subtitle: MANGO SHOTTA
Description: a quick-pour, ready-to-serve shooter designed for speed and efficiency during busy service. Its sweet, tropical mango flavour makes it highly appealing for party crowds and encourages repeat rounds. With its low cost per serve and strong customer appeal, it offers excellent margins and is a profitable, easy-win addition to any venue’s shot menu.

Subtitle: IGGY HARD LEMONADE
Description: Iggy Hard Lemonade is a fast-serve, ready-to-drink option perfect for high-volume venues. Its refreshing, easy-drinking lemon flavour appeals to a broad audience, driving frequent repeat orders. With no prep required and strong per-unit margins, it’s a highly profitable and efficient choice for busy bars and pubs

Subtitle: GRAINSHAKER CODE 128 PASSIONFRUIT CAN
Description: Grainshaker Code 128 is a quick-serve premium spirit ideal for busy service environments. Its smooth, high-quality Australian vodka is versatile for fast-pour shots or simple mixed drinks, keeping service times minimal. With its craft reputation and premium pricing, it delivers strong margins and enhances the venue’s premium drink offering.
This fizz is bright, zesty and packed with punch. Lifted citrus notes, crunchy green apple and a super fresh finish.
Dark fruit and spicy flavour explosion with velvety tannis. The fruit characters of dark chocolate and clove notes creates a rich and generous wine.

Vivacious and fresh, with a touch of wood time through fermentation for texture and mouthfeel. Strawberries and raspberries jump out of the glass and race up my hooter where they are welcomed like homecoming heroes.
Full of flavour, texture and complexity. Displaying blackberry, coco, ripe red jalapeno, plum and black olive characters. Finishing with fine tannins and power enhanced by quality integrated oak.

Cocktail: Long Story Short Single Vineyard Pinot Noir
Description: A harmonious blend of ripe cherry and subtle earthy notes, complemented by hints of spice and silky tannins. The careful ageing in oak barrels enhances its structure and adds a layer of complexity that is both intriguing and satisfying.

Cocktail: Long Story Short Single Vineyard Chardonnay
Description: The Long Story Short Single Vineyard Chardonnay 750ml offers an exquisite balance of oak and fruit, with notes of vanilla and toasted almond complementing the core of peach and melon.

Fresh and clean, made carefully from six parcels at their prime. Intensely concentrated flavour of lime, subtle passionfruit with remarkable fruit purity. This wine is unoaked displaying a delicate minerality and crisp acid finish.
A refined palate displaying beautiful mineral notes, great with acidity, finishing with good round mouth feel.

A compelling flavour profile of blackberry, violet, and subtle spice, underpinned by dried herbs. The wine's ageing in both new and used French barriques adds a refined complexity, enhancing its silky texture and bright acidity.
Status Quo is a juicy New England Pale Ale. Made for hop lovers with massive late and dry hop additions, it's full flavoured and more tropical than the Hawaiian ukulele orchestra.

A tropical little ripper, fits the bill for a long winding arvo. You know the one. Where there is nothing left to do but bask in the warm company and pit of contentment in the bright universe around you. Don't say anything different. This sunshine will never fade.

Stingrays Draught is a beer that every Tom, Dick and Harriet can enjoy. Filtered and fermented at a cool temperature to keep it clean and refreshing, this froff served ice cold will never let you down. Stay a while on a Stingrays Draught.

Created with the sharp, sophisticated beer drinker in mind, using high quality ingredients and supreme craftmanship that infuse with the unmistakable essence of Italian style; every sip evokes the qualities of an Italian summer.

Golden hazy Pacific Ale brewed with all Australian barley, wheat and Galaxy hops from Tasmania, which give the beer its big tropical fruit aromas and flavours and refreshment. This is what we’ve long called ‘Byron Bay in a bottle’.
